nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws revert if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner.
nodes.name: withdrawAll

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers some wei to the owner.
@param _value The amount to be transfered.
nodes.name: withdrawSome
withdrawToOtherAcc

nodes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
nodes.name: Destructible

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
nodes.name: destroy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers the current balance to the _recipient address and terminates the contract.
@param _recipient The address to transfer the current balance to.
nodes.name: destroyAndSendTo

nodes.documentation:
@title Donatable
@dev Base abstract contract that will be used to implement donation characteristics.
nodes.name: Donatable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Sorry we aren't accepting donations right now. Thank You for your support!"

arguments.value: Sorry we aren't accepting donations right now. Thank You for your support!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Sorry we aren't accepting donations right now. Thank You for your support!"

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws revert if status is false (not accepting).

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Owners can't donate funds to themselves"

arguments.value: Owners can't donate funds to themselves

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Owners can't donate funds to themselves"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set donation status (Accepting/Not accepting).
@param _status Boolean value true or false for Accepting and Not-Accepting respectively.
nodes.name: setStatus

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the public domain to transfer funds to the contract.
nodes.name: donate

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the public domain to view total balance in the contract.
Likely to be used by the acceptors for setting a target public can verify.
nodes.name: acceptedDonations

nodes.documentation:
@title PatronFactory
@dev Contract factory to deploy multiple instances of Patron contract.
nodes.name: PatronFactory

nodes.documentation:
@dev Method to deploy Patron instance (account) and assign an ID to it.
@param _artistAddress Ethereum address of the artist.
nodes.name: deployPatron

nodes.documentation:
@dev Method to get Patron instance (account) for a given ID.
@param _id Integer value to point to the Patron (account) instance of the artist.
nodes.name: getPatronDeploymentById

nodes.documentation:
@title PatronDashboard
@dev Dashboard implementation to support PatronFactory and facilitate its use. Still under development
nodes.name: PatronDashboard

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor method to deploy instance of Dashboard contract.
@param _database Address of the Factory contract's (PatronFactory) deployed isntance.
@dev Allows arbitrary artist (user) to deploy a patron contract, simply put create an account to accept donations.
nodes.name: newPatronDeployment

nodes.documentation:
@dev Proxy method to make a donation to any artist.
@param _id Integer value to point to the Patron (account) instance of the artist.
nodes.name: donateToArtist

devdoc.details: Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

destroyAndSendTo(address).details: Transfers the current balance to the _recipient address and terminates the contract.

params._recipient: The address to transfer the current balance to.

withdrawAll().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner.

withdrawSome(uint256).details: Transfers some wei to the owner.

withdrawToOtherAcc(address,uint256).details: Transfers the some wei to the _recipient address.
